critique: The document is an executive order related to the Emergency Relief Appropriation Act of 1936. It directs the expenditure and administration of funds appropriated by the Act, ensuring it aligns with previous orders and regulations issued by the President for the 1935 Act. The order authorizes the Works Progress Administration (WPA) to continue providing relief and work relief on useful projects, following fund allocations made by the President. It also empowers the WPA to prescribe necessary rules and regulations consistent with the order and the 1936 Act.
